actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 for 1 year with regard to the broadcasting of certain professional home games.

summary.text: Requires, for a one year period, that television broadcasting rights of professional sports games, which are under a league television contract and to which tickets are sold out forty-eight hours before game time, be made available for broadcasting at the time at which, and in the area in which, such game is being played.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 for 1 year with regard to the broadcasting of certain professional home games.
